marklogic.body:
Hey you TWLFC VP's.. Congrats! DaMan won Bay Hill. Job well done by Tiger. He's now one of 13 winners on the PGA Tour this year. Lucky 13!!
Is TW back? IMO nope, not yet but he is definitely improving.
Today being Monday I think the following age old saying is worth mentioning... "If something (or someone) is yesterday's news, it is no longer interesting".
All REAL GOLF FANS are now shifting their attention the Houston Open, defending champ Phil Mickelson and never say die, no quite, no WD Ernie Els who is trying to earn a Spot at the Masters. Enjoy!
